name: Plague Boil
desc:
Target creature must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take 1d6 poison damage per AP spent as a horrific boil emerges from their skin. On a successful saving throw, the creature takes half damage but does not have a boil emerge.

A creature that hits the victim with a weapon attack strikes the boil, causing it to burst into a hideous dark cloud that fills a 5 foot radius sphere, increased by 5 feet per AP spent past the first, for 1 minute. Creatures that start their turn in the cloud take 1d6 poison damage and are poisoned until the start of their next turn.
author: CrusaderDroid
